code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{apiRequest}from'../utils/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Register(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');try{await apiRequest('/api/auth/register','POST',{username,email,password});navigate('/login');}catch(err){setError(err.message||'Registration failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-4 max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"grid gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),className:"border p-2",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"border p-2",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"border p-2",required:true}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Register"})]})]});}export default Register;
